about_the_game:
Today, the majestic ex-Western Pacific Feather River Canyon rail line across the Sierra Nevada is host to the tonnage of rail giants Union Pacific and BNSF. Now, for Train Simulator Classic, accomplished developer High Iron Simulations brings Union Pacific and BNSF railroading to the famed and rugged California canyon with Feather River Canyon Enhanced Scenario Pack 02.

Feather River Canyon Enhanced Scenario Pack 02 includes ten realistic career scenarios featuring diverse Union Pacific and BNSF freight operations ranging from priority manifests to heavy grain and oil unit trains to locals and BNSF’s frequent and unique “bare tables” movements. And the challenging career scenarios included in this pack cover the length and breadth of the highly detailed and popular Train Simulator Classic Feather River Canyon Enhanced route.

The Western Pacific was merged into Union Pacific in 1982. When, in turn, Southern Pacific was merged into Union Pacific in 1996, BNSF was granted extensive trackage rights on UP lines, including those with Rio Grande (D&RGW) and Western Pacific heritages. During this same time period, the ex-Western Pacific “Inside Gateway” north of Keddie came under full BNSF ownership and operations.

The Portola–Oroville line today is a segment of Union Pacific’s Canyon Subdivision, while the line north from Keddie is BNSF’s Gateway Subdivision. With contemporary “Super Railroads” Union Pacific and BNSF both utilizing the Feather River Canyon, the line is a vital and captivating steel artery that delivers mountain railroading at its best.

With Feather River Canyon Enhanced Scenario Pack 02, you’ll have the opportunity to climb aboard Union Pacific GE AC4400CW, EMD SD70ACe, EMD GP40-2, and BNSF GE ES44DC diesel motive power as you serve as an engineer and handle the twisting grades and heavy tonnage of the legendary and historic ex-Western Pacific crossing of the Sierra Nevada Mountains.

With Feather River Canyon Enhanced Scenario Pack 02, you will:

  • Serve as engineer of Union Pacific’s Canyon Subdivision workhorse manifest freight M-NPRV (North Platte-Roseville) as it makes its westward descent through the Feather River Canyon.
  • Handle challenging Union Pacific local and switching duties as you work UP long-distance locals LRC60 and LRR66.
  • Amid the autumn splendor of the Feather River Canyon, bring a heavy Union Pacific unit grain train downgrade through the heart of the majestic canyon.
  • Accept an early morning call to handle yard duty at Oroville and make set-out and pick-ups at nearby lineside shippers.
  • Take the throttle of BNSF heavy freight H-BARPAS (Barstow-Pasco) as it departs Oroville and makes the climb of Union Pacific’s Canyon Subdivision en route to BNSF’s Gateway Subdivision.
  • Experience one of the route’s most unusual (but frequent) movements as you handle a BNSF “bare tables” (empty stack well cars) climbing up the canyon and onto the Gateway Subdivision.
  • Accept the challenging of bringing a heavy BNSF unit train of oil from the Bakken shale fields of North Dakota down the Gateway and Canyon Subdivisions.

Note: For full use, this scenario pack requires the Train Simulator Feather River Canyon Enhanced Route; the Tehachapi Pass: Mojave - Bakersfield Route, and the Marias Pass Route (the latter two for locomotives and rolling stock).

The ten career scenarios of this pack from High Iron Simulations, based closely on actual railroad operations and train symbols, re-create Union Pacific and BNSF railroading on the popular Feather River Canyon Enhanced route – and these memorable experiences and railroading challenges await you with Feather River Canyon Enhanced Scenario Pack 02 for Train Simulator Classic!

Included Scenarios


A selection of engaging Career scenarios are included:

  • Union Pacific M-NPRV, Pt. 1
  • Union Pacific M-NPRV, Pt. 2
  • LRC60, UP’s Quincy Turn
  • Union Pacific G-SG5TR
  • UP LRR66, Climbing to Keddie
  • Oroville Morning Call
  • BNSF Bare Tables
  • BNSF H-BARPAS, Pt. 1
  • BNSF H-BARPAS, Pt. 2
  • Bakken Oil Haul

Please Note: Train Simulator Feather River Canyon Enhanced Route; the Tehachapi Pass: Mojave - Bakersfield Route, and the Marias Pass Route add-ons are required, as a separate purchase, in order to play the scenarios featured in this add-on.

More scenarios are available on the Steam Workshop online and in-game. Train Simulator’s Steam Workshop scenarios are free and easy to download, adding many more hours of exciting gameplay. With scenarios being added daily, why don’t you check it out now!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum for 32-bit:
  • OS *: 32-bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1, 8.1 or 10 Required (Other OS versions and types are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3 4330 3.50 GHz Dual Core or AMD A8 6600K 3.90 GHz Quad Core or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R9 Graphics with 1 GB Dedicated VRAM or Better
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Connection (May incur additional costs for use)
  • Storage: 40 GB or more available space (Additional Add-Ons will require more)
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse and keyboard or Xbox Controller
Laptop, Notebook, Mobile or Low Power versions of the above specifications (including Intel or Integrated Graphics) may work but are not supported. Updates to Chipset, Graphics and Audio Device Drivers may be required. For information relating to recommended specifications for Train Simulator 64-bit, please refer to the Train Simulator Classic User Guide.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended for 32-bit:
  • OS *: 32- or 64-bit Windows 7 Service Pack 1, 8.1 or 10 Required (Other OS versions and types are not supported)
  • Processor: Intel Core-i5 4690 3.50 GHz Quad Core or AMD Ryzen 7 1700 3.80 GHz Quad Core or Better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM (maximum possible under 32-bit Windows)/16 GB or Better (For 64-bit Windows)
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 480 with 4 GB Dedicated VRAM or Better
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Connection (May incur additional costs for use)
  • Storage: High Performance SSD Recommended with 40 GB or more available space (Additional Add-Ons will require more)
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Requires mouse and keyboard or Xbox Controller
Laptop, Notebook, Mobile or Low Power versions of the above specifications (including Intel or Integrated Graphics) may work but are not supported. Updates to Chipset, Graphics and Audio Device Drivers may be required. For information relating to recommended specifications for Train Simulator 64-bit, please refer to the Train Simulator Classic User Guide.
